text: Burger Street is an American fast food restaurant chain specializing in hamburgers and chicken sandwiches. , the chain has 14 locations in the Dallas–Fort Worth metroplex and 4 locations in the greater Tulsa, Oklahoma, area. ==Overview== Burger Street was started by Bill Waugh, creator of the Taco Bueno, Casa Bonita, and Crystal's Pizza restaurant chains. The first restaurant, built in Lewisville, Texas, opened in 1985. Most locations are a small building with drive-up windows on both sides. A small outdoor eating area next to the building also sits between the lanes. ==See also== * List of hamburger restaurants ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Restaurants established in 1985 Category:Fast-food hamburger restaurants Category:Companies based in Dallas Category:1985 establishments in Texas
title: Burger Street
